description: This restaurant in set in a typical country inn. It has heavy hams, which jealously guards a small niche, and chequered tablecloths. Sample the Piedmontese cuisine with a Ligurian influence, abundant portions and quality ingredients. You will find a good dose of friendliness and charm.
